section.title: Adding Virtual Machines to a Virtual Machine Pool
section.para: If you require more virtual machines than originally provisioned in a virtual machine pool, add more machines to the pool.

procedure.title: Adding Virtual Machines to a Virtual Machine Pool

step.para: Use the Pools resource tab, tree mode, or the search function to find and select the virtual machine pool in the results list.
Click Edit to open the Edit Pool window.
Enter the number of additional virtual machines to add in the Increase number of VMs in pool by field.

section.para: You have added more virtual machines to the virtual machine pool.
